SEARCH
Package com.kneelawk.codextra.api.codec

Interface CodecOrUnit<A>

Type Parameters:
A - the type this decodes/encodes.
All Known Implementing Classes:
CodecOrUnit.Unit, CodecOrUnit.Wrapper
@Deprecated(since="1.1.0") public sealed interface CodecOrUnit<A> permits CodecOrUnit.Unit<A>, CodecOrUnit.Wrapper<A>
Deprecated.
Use Codextra.unitHandlingFieldOf(String, Codec) instead.
Type that maybe holds a codec or maybe holds a supplier.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes

    Interface

    static final record 
    CodecOrUnit.Unit<A>
    Deprecated.
    Unit type, encodes nothing, returns supplied value.
    static final record 
    CodecOrUnit.Wrapper<A>
    Deprecated.
    Wrapper type, contains a codec.
